title: Coronavirus Vaccine Distribution and Potential Mutations
itunes:title: Coronavirus Vaccine Distribution and Potential Mutations
description:
Dr. Sophia Thomas, President of the American Association of Nurse Practitioners and Bloomberg News Health Editor John Lauerman provide updates on coronavirus vaccine distribution and potential mutations. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Editor Mike Regan talk about the story “History's Unlikeliest Bull Market? Or the Most Predictable Ever?” Bloomberg News Cybersecurity Editor Andrew Martin and Neal Bridges, Cyber Security Advisor at Root Access Protection talk about whether American corporations are in the crosshairs of an international cyberwar. And we Drive to the Close with Brian Yacktman, Chief Investment Officer at YCG Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
